location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency [sic] to the Secretary to the Government, Commercial Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is transmitting a report (not present) on British trade with Bushire for the year ending 31 December 1824. It is noted that trade with Bushire is down on previous years, and would appear to be in decline.
